aligned_pac_bio_file.description: name and path of file with aligned reads

aligned_pac_bio_index_file.description: name and path of index file corresponding to aligned reads file

alignment_software.description: Software including version number used for alignment

analysis_details.description: brief description of the analysis pipeline used for producing the file

mean_coverage.description: Mean coverage of either the genome or the targeted regions

genome_coverage.description: e.g. â‰¥90% at 10x or 20x; per consortium decision

contamination.description: Contamination level estimate., e.g. <1% (display raw fraction not percent)

sex_concordance.description: Comparison between reported sex vs genotype sex

read_length_mean.description: Mean length of all reads (before/ignoring alignment)

num_aligned_bases.description: Number of bases in aligned reads

read_error_rate.description: Mean empirical per-base error rate of aligned reads

mapped_reads_pct.description: Number between 1 and 100, representing the percentage of mapped reads

methylation_called.description: Indicates whether 5mC and 6mA methylation has been called and annotated in the BAM file's MM and ML tags
